Header.title: APWS
Header.paragraph: An Autonomous Plant Watering System that will modernize the act of taking care of household plants or gardens

About.paragraph: Due to the changes in the climate and busy schedules, it can be challenging to consistently monitor and maintain your plants. Poor plant health can be attributed to various factors including dust accumulation, over-watering, diseases, cramped conditions, air quality issues, and inadequate light levels. Many at-home plant owners do not know how to keep track of these issues as time goes on, or they fail to do so. Some simply believe that they do not have a “green thumb”, while others are too busy to allocate sufficient time to tend to their plants. Consequently, many households face additional challenges due to outdated and limiting irrigation systems. Leaving many homeowners reluctant to engage with their irrigation systems. This is where a digital and modern system is required.

Services.name: Moisture Sensor
Services.text: Main factor used to determine watering times

Services.name: Humidity Level
Services.text: Monitors the humidity level of the air outside

Services.name: Temperature
Services.text: Monitors the temperature outside for monitoring and making sure it is suitable for the plant

Services.name: Light Level
Services.text: Monitors the light the plant is receiving so YOU can know if it is receiving enough light

Services.name: Water Capacity
Services.text: Monitors the water level of the water tank, and sends a notification when it is getting to low and needs tobe refilled

Services.name: Battery Life
Services.text: Monitors the BAttery level of your probe and hub, and lets you know when it may be time to replace them

Features.title: Self Watering
Features.text: Tank full of water that will water your plants when needed as needed

Features.title: Plant Sensors
Features.text: Probe with five different sensors so you can keep track of all your plant statistics

Features.title: Hub
Features.text: Have more than one Plant you want to monitor? No problem, all you need is another probe for the plant, but it can all be monitored via one hub in your houshold

Features.title: Monitoring
Features.text: All in one web-application for you to monitor all your plants, change settings, and even manually water your plants if you choose to
